name: Chat Millions - Stream Quiz Game
description:
Play the classic 4-choice quiz with a new twist, and see if your twitch chat has what it takes to win the millions.

Twitch integration


This game is build around playing with viewers. When playing in "Stream Mode" the game will poll answers from chat and choose the most popular. Finally they can prove whether they really do know more than you!

But don't rest yet, if chat can't decide they might leave it up to you...

Lifelines


Along with voting on answers, chat members can vote to use a lifeline. If that wins you have a variety of options:
  • 50:50 - Take away half the answers, leaving the right answer and one wrong answer.
  • Streamer's Choice - Most quiz games ask the audience, in Chat Millions the audience asks you!
  • Swap The Question - Got absolutely no idea what the answer could be? For one time you can try another question instead.

Categories


There are a variety of topics to choose from, you can play with all of them or just your favourites. Of course if you have more topics you get more variety, but that's a decision left for you.

Planned additions


  • More questions in existing topics
  • More topics
  • The ability to add your own questions

To keep up to date with all new additions make sure to check out our contact links.

Thank you for looking at this game and I hope you enjoy!
